title: Veterinary Intake Form
description: Complete this form for your pet's veterinary visit

intro.title: Veterinary Intake Form
intro.description: Thank you for choosing our veterinary clinic. To provide the best care for your pet, please complete this intake form with accurate information about your pet's health history and current condition.

phone_primary.title: Primary Phone Number
phone_primary.description: Please enter your primary phone number

phone_alternate.title: Alternate Phone Number
phone_alternate.description: Please enter an alternate phone number (optional)

state.title: State/Province
state.description: Please enter your state or province

postal_code.title: Postal/Zip Code
postal_code.description: Please enter your postal or zip code

emergency_contact_name.title: Emergency Contact Name
emergency_contact_name.description: Please provide an emergency contact name

emergency_contact_phone.title: Emergency Contact Phone
emergency_contact_phone.description: Please provide an emergency contact phone number

relationship_to_emergency_contact.title: Relationship to Emergency Contact
relationship_to_emergency_contact.description: Please specify your relationship to the emergency contact

referral_source.title: Referral Source
referral_source.description: How did you hear about our veterinary clinic?

other_referral_source.title: Other Referral Source
other_referral_source.description: If you selected 'Other', please specify how you heard about us

other_pet_type.title: Other Pet Type
other_pet_type.description: If you selected 'Other', please specify your pet's type

color_markings.title: Color/Markings
color_markings.description: Please describe your pet's color and any distinctive markings

date_of_birth.title: Date of Birth
date_of_birth.description: Please enter your pet's date of birth (if known)

age.title: Age
age.description: If date of birth is unknown, please provide your pet's approximate age

spayed_neutered.title: Spayed/Neutered
spayed_neutered.description: Has your pet been spayed or neutered?

microchip_id.title: Microchip ID
microchip_id.description: If your pet is microchipped, please provide the microchip ID

weight.title: Weight (lbs)
weight.description: Please enter your pet's weight in pounds (if known)

pet_photo.title: Pet Photo
pet_photo.description: Upload a recent photo of your pet (optional)

previous_vet.title: Previous Veterinarian
previous_vet.description: Has your pet been seen by another veterinarian?

previous_vet_name.title: Previous Veterinarian Name
previous_vet_name.description: If yes, please provide the name of your previous veterinarian

previous_vet_clinic.title: Previous Veterinary Clinic
previous_vet_clinic.description: If applicable, please provide the name of the previous veterinary clinic

previous_vet_phone.title: Previous Veterinarian Phone
previous_vet_phone.description: If applicable, please provide the phone number of the previous veterinary clinic

records_transfer.title: Records Transfer
records_transfer.description: Would you like us to request your pet's medical records from the previous veterinarian?

vaccination_history.title: Vaccination History
vaccination_history.description: Please provide information about your pet's vaccination history

last_vaccines.title: Last Vaccines Date
last_vaccines.description: When did your pet last receive vaccines?

current_medications.title: Current Medications
current_medications.description: Please list any medications your pet is currently taking

allergies.title: Allergies
allergies.description: Please list any known allergies your pet has

previous_medical_conditions.title: Previous Medical Conditions
previous_medical_conditions.description: Please list any previous medical conditions your pet has had

previous_surgeries.title: Previous Surgeries
previous_surgeries.description: Please list any previous surgeries your pet has had

diet.title: Current Diet
diet.description: Please describe your pet's current diet (brand, type, amount, frequency)

parasite_prevention.title: Parasite Prevention
parasite_prevention.description: What parasite prevention is your pet currently on?

other_parasite_prevention.title: Other Parasite Prevention
other_parasite_prevention.description: If you selected 'Other', please specify the parasite prevention

visit_reason.title: Reason for Visit
visit_reason.description: Please describe the primary reason for your pet's visit today

symptoms.title: Current Symptoms
symptoms.description: Please describe any symptoms your pet is currently experiencing

symptom_onset.title: Symptom Onset
symptom_onset.description: When did you first notice these symptoms?

symptom_frequency.title: Symptom Frequency
symptom_frequency.description: How often does your pet experience these symptoms?

symptom_progression.title: Symptom Progression
symptom_progression.description: How have the symptoms changed since they began?

water_consumption.title: Water Consumption
water_consumption.description: Has your pet's water consumption changed?

urination_changes.title: Urination Changes
urination_changes.description: Have you noticed any changes in your pet's urination?

bowel_movement_changes.title: Bowel Movement Changes
bowel_movement_changes.description: Have you noticed any changes in your pet's bowel movements?

vomiting_frequency.title: Vomiting Frequency
vomiting_frequency.description: If your pet has been vomiting, how often?

vomiting_description.title: Vomiting Description
vomiting_description.description: If your pet has been vomiting, please describe the vomit (color, content, etc.)

activity_level.title: Activity Level
activity_level.description: Has your pet's activity level changed?

behavior_changes.title: Behavior Changes
behavior_changes.description: Have you noticed any changes in your pet's behavior?

pain_signs.title: Signs of Pain
pain_signs.description: Have you noticed any signs that your pet might be in pain?

additional_concerns.title: Additional Concerns
additional_concerns.description: Please describe any additional concerns about your pet's health

treatment_authorization.title: Treatment Authorization
treatment_authorization.description: I authorize the veterinarian to examine and provide treatment for my pet as deemed necessary.

financial_responsibility.title: Financial Responsibility
financial_responsibility.description: I understand that payment is due at the time services are rendered and I accept financial responsibility for all charges incurred for the treatment of my pet.

information_accuracy.title: Information Accuracy
information_accuracy.description: I certify that the information provided in this form is accurate and complete to the best of my knowledge.

photo_consent.title: Photo Consent
photo_consent.description: I give permission for the veterinary clinic to take photos of my pet for medical records and potential use in educational or promotional materials.

communication_preference.title: Communication Preference
communication_preference.description: How would you prefer to receive communications from us?

signature.title: Digital Signature
signature.description: Please type your full name as your digital signature

thank_you.title: Thank You!
thank_you.description: Thank you for providing this information about your pet. This will help us provide the best possible care. A member of our veterinary team will review this information and discuss your pet's health with you during your appointment.
